revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Zero One Technology |model=PAN1000W |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/17/2003 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=print server |fcc_id=HUFWP03001 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=3.3 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510B |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800TTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=2 |ram1_brand=TurnKeys |ram1_model=TK57V161610DTC-7 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Parallel |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3871 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3684 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} The device almost assuredly shares the same manufacturer as the [[D-Link DP-311P]].
The FCC test report lists the following additional models.. *Zero One Technology PAN1000W / PA1000W *Elecom LD-WL11PS/P1 *PCI (Planex) Mini PWF *TRENDnet TEW-PS1
The RAM is assumed to be 2MB, same as the [[D-Link DP-311P]].
"535WP-I A2" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. "KCS01S0D" is silkscreened on the board on the wireless module.
